text:
In [[Categorical Syllogisms|Categorical Syllogism]], the [[Mood]] is the arrangement of a Syllogism's [[Propositions|Categorical Proposition]].

(4 types of [[Propositions|Categorical Proposition]])^^(3 [[Propositions|Categorical Proposition]] in a [[Syllogism|Categorical Syllogism]]) ^^ = 64 [[Moods|Mood]]

<<prs summary>>
title: Mood
